title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When attempting to create a new package using the New Package Wizard, the message displayed is unclear and may lead to confusion among users.
EB: The New Package Wizard should present a clear and concise message that guides users through the process of creating a new package within a Java project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the newly created project.
3. Attempt to create a new package using the New Package Wizard.
